like a
business this is a place where convening
the leaders from around the world is is
really something that I think we do
better than anyone else people set the
bar high for great performance and so
they don't ask you to perform well they
just show you how well they perform and
they inspire you to do the same it's a
place that provides you training it
gives you all the tools it's up to you
to take advantage of that training we're
always reading we're always thinking
we're always learning we like to teach
and learn so it's infectious I mean it
just it it swirls around us every day
the environment is one where it is high
performance High commitment no detail
too small HBS to me is a 24-hour place
it never shuts down and I think that
really speaks to the community when it's
just a place that's really alive any
hour of the

day so I think people should come here
because they too believe that leadership

purpose so the excitement and the
connection and the meaning that people
derive from the mission of the school is
I think the most important thing
we have to be a living model of what's

so by our example every one of the staff
are are in a teaching position it's an
institution that is serious and
important but doesn't take itself too
seriously things aren't fixed it's
Dynamic it's changing all the time and

on the place they they
[Music]
work I couldn't have imagined 19 years
ago when I walked in the door here that
I would still be here 19 years later but
here I am and it's all because of the
collegiality the
teamwork the kind of support we get and
the kind of colleagues we get to work
with don't be intimidated by the brand
name be attracted to that brand name be
curious about it come talk to us and
you'll feel I think what I feel here at
the Harvard Business School and that's
inclusiveness that's the sense of
community here and they support you
being the best that you can
be we were amongst the people that
created business education this was a
field that didn't exist when we started
it was a delicate experiment nobody even
knew if a Graduate School of Business
education was going to be an enduring
idea here we are beginning our second
century and people look to us as a place

of this field that's a very special
place uh to be a part of to be a part of
an institution that both has this
extraordinary tradition and history this
